about-details-1: 1. Dongke Industrial development company is the professional PPE manufacturer, and produce the first face shield in Shenzhen.
about-details-2: 2. We had donated face shields and goggles to nearly 100 hospitals including Wuhan, Beijing, Shenzhen, Philippines, Spain, etc. And we donate tens of thousands of face shields to refugees in the Middle East.
